title: Recovery-Oriented Education Program for Mental Health Care Providers

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental Concepts in Mental Health and Practical Care Experience
context.additional_context: Blended learning environment combining smartphone-based online learning modules with offline workshops

learning_goals: They can apply the five core principles of recovery-oriented care to practical cases.
Participants can explain at least three recovery strategies based on service user experiences.
They can develop self-care plans for caregivers using digital platforms.
Peer feedback-based project outcomes are used to assess recovery support competencies.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
